original_title: LAUGFS Lubricants expands its footprint to Maldives
original_body_lines: LAUGFS Lubricants, a brand known locally and internationally, recently ventured into international market to expand its service offering to the Maldives as a part of LAUGFS Strategic plan to enter new international markets. The signing was attended by LAUGFS Lubricants representatives and Mechanism Maldives (Pvt) Ltd representatives.

Cluster Director/CEO, LAUGFS Lubricants – Dr. Niroshan J Pieries speaking at the signing, said, “We are pleased to partner with Mechanism Maldives (Pvt) Ltd as they share in our vision and values to provide excellence in service and product for all our users. As we enter the Maldivian market, we are confident in our ability to meet the ever-growing market needs of the times and to strengthen the LAUGFS foothold in Asia further as the only Sri Lankan Brand.”

Managing Director, Mechanism Maldives (Pvt) Ltd – Adam Ali said: “We are glad to partner with LAUGFS Lubricants Ltd, and are excited to grow the business together. Providing products of this calibre to local markets in the Maldives will allow us to meet the growing market gap creating greater opportunities for business and international growth.”
